name: openpose-hand-opencv-cpu
description: CPU-only hand keypoint detection using OpenPose hand (Caffe) via OpenCV DNN. CLI, folder batch, image overlays, CSV report.

name: hand-keypoints-opencv-dnn
description: Detect 21 hand keypoints with OpenPose (Caffe) using OpenCV DNN on CPU. Saves keypoints/skeleton images and a CSV report.

name: openpose-hand-local-inference
description: Local CPU inference for OpenPose hand model with OpenCV DNN. Batch images, draw skeletons, export CSV, no Caffe install.

name: openpose-hand-cpu-starter
description: Starter kit for CPU-only OpenPose hand inference using OpenCV DNN. Easy setup, model downloader, outputs and CSV.

name: hand-pose-detection-cpu
description: CPU-only hand pose/keypoint detection via OpenCV DNN (OpenPose hand model). Simple CLI with overlays and CSV export.

name: openpose-hand-cli
description: Command-line OpenPose hand inference (CPU) with OpenCV DNN. Batch folders, draw keypoints/skeletons, write CSV.
